NAME: TAIEX Study Visit on Environmental Protection Information Technology Management
AREALEGISLATION: 27 Environment [15] (Partial),27.10 Environment [15.10] (Partial),27.10.10 General provisions and programmes [15.10.10] (Complete)
AIMASSISTANCE: Provide practical advice on the advantages and disadvantages of using open source tools and codes for E-services in the environmental protection domain. Provide practical guidance on information systems developed with open source technology; internal and external system linkages; system security, management and reporting processes. Provide specific advice on new and innovative approaches to government to customers / citizens (G2C) in the environmental protection domain.
LEGISLATIONADMIN:
IPPC: No 166/2006  
WEEE: 2012/19/EU  
Hazardous waste: No 649/2012 
Air Pollution:  2008/50/EC
TARGETAUDIENCE: Information Technology Division of the Ministry of Environmental Protection
COMMENTLOGISTIC: Interpretation is not required as per the application form
